0.6.name: wordpress/multi-rss-reader-widet
0.6.description: This is a multi rss reader widget plugin. Please take advantage of this to display on sidebar. Each widget can have multi url of rss, and show mearged rss topic order by date. You can customize each settings (such as url's , number of articles , number of chars ..) at widget page of apparence. You can also customize common layout of rss articles at setting's submenu (adapted to all "multi rss reader" widgets).
